name: Power Idle
description:
Idle Power is a Power Production Based idle game with some unique mechanics

Such as ever increasing pollution hurts your production

You have to Research to Develop new power sources

2 Layer Prestige

Prestige 1 Activates at 100% Pollution

Prestige 2 Activates at 1e306 aka Infinity Power

Prestige Upgrades

You'll figure out what they are as you play

Currently in Early Access

Report Bugs and Issues: https://github.com/MrBacon470/Idle-Power/issues

Wanna Join The Community?

Join The Discord:https://discord.gg/DNK5UED
